    public abstract class Z4AbstractEllipseInscribedFiller
extends Z4AbstractBoundaryBehaviorFiller
    A Filler which can be inscribed in an ellipse
    Author:
    gianpiero.diblasi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Z4AbstractEllipseInscribedFiller

        public Z4AbstractEllipseInscribedFiller​(Z4GradientColor gradientColor,
                                        int cx,
                                        int cy,
                                        int rx,
                                        int ry,
                                        double angle,
                                        int vertexCount,
                                        int boundaryBehavior)
        Creates the object
        Parameters:
        gradientColor - The color used to fill
        cx - The x-axis coordinate of the center point of the inscribing ellipse
        cy - The y-axis coordinate of the center point of the inscribing ellipse
        rx - The x-radius of the inscribing ellipse
        ry - The y-radius of the inscribing ellipse
        angle - The rotation angle of the inscribing ellipse
        vertexCount - The number of vertices of the polygon
        boundaryBehavior - The boundary behavior
